name: Gee Whizz
description:
In space... no one can hear you scream... in enjoyment!

Gee Whizz is a game about propelling yourself through space with various tools you find floating around in the debris of a damaged spaceship. Your goal is to explore said ship's remnants, solving puzzles to progress to the next section.

Tools can be picked up with E and dropped with D.

Dropping them will push you back a little bit depending on their weight and also rotate you, since you threw it, you numpty.
